name: Pine Cone Evolution
description:
Your aim is to be the first to grow the pine cone...

Will you beat the ai?

Or will it beat you?

Can you make the pine cone turn into the tallest tree?!?!?!

How To Play:

Press the key that is on screen and watch your completion bar fill up, get to certain points and your tree will evolve. Be the first to get to the tree's final form.
